mapper.select: select * from orders order by ord_no desc

select count(*) from orders o inner join order_detail od on o.ord_no = od.ord_no inner join product p on od.pro_no = p.pro_no where od.pro_no = (select min(pro_no) from order_detail where ord_no = o.ord_no) and mem_id = #{id}

select o.ord_no, od.pro_no, p.pro_name, p.pro_writer, p.pro_price, o.ord_date, o.ord_status, (select count(distinct pro_no) - 1 from order_detail where ord_no = o.ord_no) as ord_another from orders o join order_detail od on o.ord_no = od.ord_no join product p on od.pro_no = p.pro_no where od.pro_no = (select min(pro_no) from order_detail where ord_no = o.ord_no) and mem_id = #{id} order by o.ord_no desc

select o.ord_no, od.pro_no, p.pro_image, p.pro_name, p.pro_writer, p.pro_price, o.ord_date, o.ord_status, (select count(distinct pro_no) - 1 from order_detail where ord_no = o.ord_no) as ord_another from orders o join order_detail od on o.ord_no = od.ord_no join product p on od.pro_no = p.pro_no where od.pro_no = (select min(pro_no) from order_detail where ord_no = o.ord_no) and mem_id = #{id} order by o.ord_no desc
